snippet.textDisplay:
Where was all this panic in 2009…??

There was none!

Just in the United States alone…

H1N1 produced 61,000,000 MILLION cases!!

13,000 THOUSAND deaths!!!

And yet…

Nobody was hoarding supplies

No hospitals were worried that they wouldn’t have room

No stock market crash

No sporting events canceled

No mass hysteria…lol

What’s the difference now?…

Below is just a little bit of information… Followed by a link to the CDC where you can see the statistics for yourself😏


CDC Estimates of 2009 H1N1 Influenza Cases, Hospitalizations and Deaths in the United States

During the pandemic, CDC provided estimates of the numbers of 2009 H1N1 cases, hospitalizations and deaths on seven different occasions. Final estimates were published in 2011. These final estimates were that from April 12, 2009 to April 10, 2010 approximately 60.8 million cases (range: 43.3-89.3 million), 274,304 hospitalizations (195,086-402,719), and 12,469 deaths (8868-18,306) occurred in the United States due to pH1N1. These final estimates are available at: Estimating the burden of 2009 pandemic influenza A (H1N1) in the United States (April 2009-April 2010)External Web Site Icon, Shrestha SS, et al., Clin Infect Dis. 2011 Jan 1;52 Suppl 1:S75-82.
snippet.textOriginal:
Where was all this panic in 2009…??

No mass hysteria…lol

What’s the difference now?…

Below is just a little bit of information… Followed by a link to the CDC where you can see the statistics for yourself😏


CDC Estimates of 2009 H1N1 Influenza Cases, Hospitalizations and Deaths in the United States

During the pandemic, CDC provided estimates of the numbers of 2009 H1N1 cases, hospitalizations and deaths on seven different occasions. Final estimates were published in 2011. These final estimates were that from April 12, 2009 to April 10, 2010 approximately 60.8 million cases (range: 43.3-89.3 million), 274,304 hospitalizations (195,086-402,719), and 12,469 deaths (8868-18,306) occurred in the United States due to pH1N1. These final estimates are available at: Estimating the burden of 2009 pandemic influenza A (H1N1) in the United States (April 2009-April 2010)External Web Site Icon, Shrestha SS, et al., Clin Infect Dis. 2011 Jan 1;52 Suppl 1:S75-82.

snippet.textDisplay:
Want to know where this corona virus mutant came from? First, realize that a virus adapts (like crazy) to changing conditions in its environment. So, for example, if a virus was swimming around, in some river.... minding its own business... It had no idea (if viruses can think), that upstream from it, there was a pharmaceutical drug manufacturing plant, which primarily created the pharmaceutical "base", for all sorts of antibiotic drugs. So this is the "scene"...okay?



 One day (or perhaps all the time, who knows).... a little bit of toxic antibiotic-laden effluent drained into the local waterway, and eventually, made its way through the entire waterway... ( since the drug manufacturing plant was stupidly located next to it).... but this effluent was diluted by the stream/river...



 When the water with the pharma drugs in it, finally reached the microbe, it ALMOST killed the virus... (Man, that virus was floating around for days, with this splitting headache.... and felt nauseous all the time !) But then, it got better.... and started feeling good... (In fact, it was feeling better than ever before, .... and then it noticed that it's physical structure had shifted in some slight, strange way. )



 Later, this virus felt less and less effect from each repeated exposure to the pharma waste. One day, a fish and an eel were caught from this stream... and taken to market. The fish and eel were both carriers of this, now mutant virus.... upon which NONE of the antibiotics which were currently being produced, had ANY significant effect. These "prize catches", were sold to at least two customers, who handled the fish as they cleaned the fish, and prepared it for dinner. So it seems likely that something like this, is probably the way most new viruses come into contact with humanity. I propose that THIS is where the MCV (Mutant-Corona-Virus) actually came from. I also propose that viruses hang around IN other animals, and in some plants, and that these animals act only as a "carrier". When the virus is ingested, by another animal (either through hand/saliva contact...(such as touching the face or eye with one's hand)... it is uptaken into that new body... and it either finds a home, or not. The stronger the virus becomes, the more problematic it is for a species ! ....(I feel that the process of going through whatever physical changes are required, in a virus, to actually create the antibiotic RESISTANCE... probably also makes that organism stronger.(physically more durable).


This is a huge problem, and I feel like ... if you really LOOK CLOSELY, you can see this circular pattern, of the pharma companies actually CREATING the problem.... and the problem is actually compounded as the environment, which is filled with microbes.... becomes more and more "comfortable" with, and resistant to, our entire arsenal of pharmaceutical drugs, and they lose their effectiveness, entirely. A huge danger for humanity. This is the best documentary I've seen so far, about this problem. As it turns out, MOST of the pharmaceutical drugs are now manufactured in China and India. (because of cheaper labor costs, and more lax environmental standards.... most probably). So, YOU be the judge. Do you think this way of medicine and of "fighting" all the microbes out there is really even possible? You COULD think I am crazy for what I am about to say, but really, think what you like.



For thousands of generations, humanity depended upon the local environments in all the places, all over the world, to support their communities. One of the most respected positions in the tribe, was the medicine-person / healer.... for good, and obvious reasons. But until about 70120 years ago, humanity had only plant medicines (though some tried chemicals, with little good success). Plant medicines were the primary medicines of humanity, and still, about 70 % of all humans use herbs. The reason herbs work so well, is that our bodies are familiar with the chemistry of plants, because we eat them every day, as salad, soups, and even Tempeh , breads, etc. Each medicinal plant contains around 200 separate phyto-chemicals... which act in different ways on our human physiology. Thus, we truly receive a WIDE... (not narrow) chemical impact in our bodies... from a wider spectrum of herbal constituents. A small medicinal plant or shrub, can grow complex chemistries in its little body, that even a pharmaceutical complex, blocks long, could not synthesize ! So, I propose that we begin to work with herbalists in China, and throughout the world, to restore the Earth environment, and let IT GROW our medicines for us, once more, as an intelligent, human species, who can tell the difference between a "sick-care" system of medicine, and a system of medicine which requires YOUR participation... in the WELL-CARE lifestyle, each of us seemingly needs to find and grow into, along with our friends, neighbors, and family. Seek out your local herbalist, and have a conversation about this stuff. It's really important. <3


I really love all of you out there... and have such a strong desire to see all of us doing well... feeling vibrant and strong, and pain-free, in our bodies, and then expressing our gratitude back towards Nature... as we really embrace loving and caring for OURSELVES. Let us create a world without war... in which we have a brilliant dance with Nature, and with one another... before it is all-too-soon over. Dance dance dance. We're "burning daylight" ! Be safe... stay well Here's the link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H9EJuAU2Un4&t=10s

So, for example, if a virus was swimming around, in some river.... minding its own business...   It had no idea (if viruses can think), that upstream from it, there was a pharmaceutical drug manufacturing plant, which primarily created the pharmaceutical "base", for all sorts of antibiotic drugs.  So this is the "scene"...okay? 



 One day  (or perhaps all the time, who knows).... a little bit of toxic antibiotic-laden effluent drained into the local waterway, and eventually, made its way through the entire waterway... ( since the drug manufacturing  plant was stupidly located next to it).... but this effluent was diluted by the stream/river... 



 When the water with the pharma drugs in it, finally reached the microbe, it ALMOST killed the virus...    (Man, that virus was floating around for days, with this splitting headache.... and felt nauseous all the time !)      But then, it got better.... and started feeling good... (In fact, it was feeling better than ever before, .... and then it noticed that it's physical structure had shifted in some slight, strange way. ) 



 Later, this virus felt less and less effect from each repeated exposure to the pharma waste.  One day,  a fish and an eel were caught from this stream... and taken to market.   The fish and eel were both carriers of this, now mutant virus.... upon which NONE of the antibiotics which were currently being produced, had ANY significant effect. I also propose that viruses hang around IN other animals, and in some plants, and that these animals act only as a "carrier".     When the virus is ingested, by another animal (either through hand/saliva contact...(such as touching the face or eye with one's hand)... it is uptaken into that new body... and it either finds a home, or not.    The stronger the virus becomes, the more problematic it is for a species ! ....(I feel that the process of going through whatever physical changes are required, in a virus, to actually create the antibiotic RESISTANCE... probably also makes that organism stronger.(physically more durable).


This is a huge problem, and I feel like ... if you really LOOK CLOSELY, you can see this circular pattern, of the pharma companies actually CREATING the problem.... and the problem is actually compounded as the environment, which is filled with microbes.... becomes more and more "comfortable" with, and resistant to, our entire arsenal of pharmaceutical drugs, and they lose their effectiveness, entirely. Thus, we truly receive a WIDE... (not narrow) chemical impact in our bodies... from a wider spectrum of herbal constituents. So, I propose that we begin to work with herbalists in China, and throughout the world, to restore the Earth environment, and let IT GROW our medicines for us, once more, as an intelligent, human species, who can tell the difference between a "sick-care" system of medicine, and a system of medicine which requires YOUR participation... in the WELL-CARE lifestyle, each of us seemingly needs to find and grow into, along with our friends, neighbors, and family. snippet.textDisplay: I'm in my 20's and I'm a healthy individual. I live with my parents and my dad is in his 50's and his respiratory isn't the best. I don't mind going to college because I'm in a program that I love. If I get the virus I'll be fine. However, my dad won't be that fine. And that's what scares me the most. This Mayor needs to look at both sides.

snippet.textDisplay:
History and Etymology for corona
Noun

borrowed from Latin corōna "garland worn on the head as a mark of honor or emblem of majesty, halo around a celestial body, top part of an entablature"

2 Timothy 4:8
Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.
snippet.textOriginal:
History and Etymology for corona
Noun

borrowed from Latin corōna "garland worn on the head as a mark of honor or emblem of majesty, halo around a celestial body, top part of an entablature"

2 Timothy 4:8
Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.

snippet.textDisplay: You guys wanna know why America is scared of this? It’s because of the same reason the REST OF THE WORD is starting to lock down there country’s!! Just because it doesn’t seem as serious rn, it’s going to be with us for a while, and that gives viruses the time to MUTATE, and turn into a serious worldwide health concern.if it’s already worldwide which it already is, once it mutates,then it’s becomes a worldwide emergency. For these buffoons on the news,and those in the government who tell you it’s not serious unless your old, have never taken a damn biology class. They use a worldwide virus, something that affects the health of everyone on the planet, to gain political power,and in the case of this dumbass show, ratings. At the end of it all, it is way better to be safe than sorry, lock it all down, than just have everyone all feeling safe and not spreading this. Turn fear into a good thing and just be safe guys. Then when you didn’t get it because you were precautionary,and it mutates, you can say you told everyone so. Be safe everyone, and wash your hands. You only need to buy 2 weeks worth of backup supplies, stop buying out the stores and spread the safety, not the illness. Instead of buying 96 goddamn rolls of toilet paper and raising prices, buy 32, you don’t need 96 for 2 weeks, and that way 2 more families can buy those other 48 you didn’t get. Keep yourself, AND everyone else safe guys
